Item.comments: onAfterAdd and onAfterUpdate on Relationship "Document Book DocSections"
Item.method_code:
' called onAfterAdd, onAfterUpdate 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
' copies defined data ' from source item "Document Book" ' to related Item "Document Section"
Dim res As Item Dim thisItem As Item = Me thisItem = Me.newItem(Me.GetType(),"get") thisItem.setID(Me.GetID()) thisItem.setAttribute("select","source_id(keyed_name,name,owned_by_id,managed_by_id,team_id),sort_order,related_id(keyed_name,owned_by_id,managed_by_id,team_id)") thisItem.setAttribute("serverEvents","0") thisItem = thisItem.apply() If thisItem.isError() Then Return thisItem
Dim sourceItemType As String = "Document Book" Dim relatedItemType As String = "Document Section" Dim sourceItem As Item = thisItem.getPropertyItem("source_id")
Dim SQLstr As String Dim updateValue As String
Dim tableName As String = "[" & CCO.DB.GenerateTableName(relatedItemType) & "]" SQLstr = "UPDATE " & tableName
SQLstr = SQLstr & " SET " & tableName & ".header_item_id_string='" & thisItem.getProperty("source_id","invalid") & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".header_item_type='" & sourceItemType & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".is_top_node='1'"
' inherit from source Item updateValue = sourceItem.getProperty("name","Null") If updateValue <> "Null" Then updateValue = "'" & updateValue & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".header_item_name=" & updateValue
Dim propsToCopy As String() = {"owned_by_id","managed_by_id","team_id"} 'if not set on related item
Dim i As Integer For i=0 To propsToCopy.Length-1 ' only update if prop on related item is empty If thisItem.getPropertyItem("related_id").getProperty(propsToCopy(i),"") = "" Then updateValue = sourceItem.getProperty(propsToCopy(i),"Null") If updateValue <> "Null" Then updateValue = "'" & updateValue & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & "." & propsToCopy(i) & "=" & updateValue End If Next i
SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE " & tableName & ".id='" & thisItem.getProperty("related_id","invalid") & "'" res= Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLstr) If res.isError() Then Return res
Return Me
